result.eng: We need a professional writer, such as a journalist.
result.ga: Scríbhneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseora
result.orig: Scríbhneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseora

result.ponchtml: Scríḃneoir proifisiúnta atá uainn dála iriseoraWe need a professional writer, such as a journalist.

result.html: Tá caidreamh gairmiúil againnWe have a professional relationship.
result.ponchtml: Tá caidreaṁ gairmiúil againnWe have a professional relationship.

result.eng: Hardly any professional journalist is able to make a career out of blogging.
result.ga: Is beag iriseoir gairmiúil atá ábalta a bheatha a bhaint i dtír leis an bhlagadóireacht
